com.ble.ble.oad

Class CC2541OADProxy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ble.ble.oad.OADProxy
      • com.ble.ble.oad.CC2541OADProxy

  • public final class CC2541OADProxy
extends OADProxy
    本类兼容了3种升级方式：

    CC2541 OAD, CC2541 Large Image OAD, CC2640 On-Chip OAD

    Since:
    v1.0.8

      • CC2541OADProxy

        @Deprecated
public CC2541OADProxy(android.content.Context context,
                                   BleService bleService,
                                   OADListener listener)
        Deprecated. 
        用此构造函数创建的实例只针对CC2541的普通OAD升级，推荐使用 OADManager.getOADProxy(BleService, OADListener, OADType)
